data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wanat, Marek, Poussereau, Jacques (2019): Mascarapion, a new genus of the Apioninae (Coleoptera, Curculionoidea) from the Mascarene Islands. Zootaxa 4615 (2): 343-350, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4615.2.6|16 occurrences
